title: CheckWise Configuration Schema
description: JSON Schema for .github/checkwise.yml configuration file for CheckWise GitHub Action.

when.description: File path glob patterns to match.

require.description: Checklist items required for this rule.

optional.description: If true, this rule is optional. Default: false.

branch_pattern.description: Glob pattern for branches where the checklist applies.

label_filter.description: List of PR labels to filter.

comment_header.description: Custom header for the checklist comment.
